name: Maestri House Rechargeable Milk Frother with Stand, LunaFro Handheld Electric Foam Maker Waterproof Detachable Stainless Steel Whisk Drink Mixer Foamer for Lattes, Cappuccino
short_description: One-button Operated Design: One press to start the whisking and another press to stop frothing. Just place the LunaFro handheld milk frother’s whisk into the container with milk or other liquid food, then press the button to make milk foam, and press the button again to stop working. It’s effortless to clean. Only put the mixing head into water or soapy water, and then press the button to let eddy water current clean it completely. USB-C Rechargeable for Long Battery Life: Unlike other battery-operated milk frother, this rechargeable milk frother has a built-in 1200mAh lithium battery, so there is no need to replace the battery frequently. This rechargeable foam maker can be fully charged about 3 hours for 2-3 months using(including USB-C charging cable). The white light flashes slowly when charging, and turns off after being fully charged. Make Rich Creamy Forth in Seconds: This ingenious drink mixer is powerful with high-powered turbo engine(8000±10%RPM), so it can get smooth and creamy forth in 15 seconds. If you are a morning coffee lover then using this delicate foam maker will be the fastest way to get you velvety smooth milk foam on the top of coffee in the busy morning. Stylish and Versatile: This LunaFro electric milk frother is compact and styled. The lightweight and portable design is convenient for you to carry out anywhere and help you enjoy special taste of froth up lattes, matcha, cappuccino, and hot chocolate. In addition to fancy coffee drinks, other medications and powdered supplements can be mixed into beverages easily such as protein. It’s effortless for you to use it to mix milkshakes, frappe and other mixed drinks. Cleaning and Storage is a Breeze: Coming with two frothing whisks, the whisk can be replaced easily in case you lost one of it. It’s also a cinch to clean. Just easily remove the attachment, and then place the whisk in water to wash it. There is a compact stainless steel stand for easy and accessible storage.

name: Electric Milk Frother, 4-in-1 Electric Milk Steamer,10 oz/300 ML Automatic Cold And Warm Foam Maker For Coffee,Latte,Cappuccino,Macciato, Hot chocolate,Non-Stick Coating,Easy Clean,Black
short_description: This milk frother feaures 4 functions, warm milk froth(thick firm foam), warm milk froth(airy foam), cold milk froth and heat milk. LARGE CAPACITY - Enjoy ample froth, whether you're a solo drinker or hosting pals. This frother effortlessly makes up to 5 oz of froth or EASY CLEANING & SAFE USE - Featuring a Teflon coating and double-wall design for Non-Stick coating, scald-protection, our milk frother is exceptionally easy to clean – simply rinse with hot soapy water. For added safety, it's equipped with an automatic shut-off feature. SPEED & SILENCE OPERATION - Whip up hot or cold milk froth in under 2 minutes, quietly. Our 500W frother makes beverage magic at below 30dB. POUR WITH PRECISION - Say goodbye to guesswork. Our built-in milk level indicator ensures the right pour every time.

name: Bodum 10oz Bistro Electric Milk Frother, Black
short_description: Milk frother Bistro milk frother was designed to make you a professional Barista without leaving your doorstep Compact small electric milk frother has convenient cord storage in the removable base perfect if you plan to leave out on the kitchen counter Sleek design auto shut off when finished Transparent lid allows the frothing to be observed Servings Bistro milk frother heats 1 cup (300 ml) of milk at a time Perfect for serving yourself or your family Material non-stick coating interior ensures easy cleaning and durability Stainless Steel body Tritan plastic lid 2 Year Manufacturer
product_description: The Bodum electric milk frother was designed to make you a professional barista without leaving your doorstep The heavy-duty motor makes luxuriously thick creamy and long-lasting froth from milk You may never buy whipping cream again! Level indicators show you when you have it right

name: Zulay Kitchen Powerful Milk Frother Wand With 2 Duracell Batteries - Ultra Fast Handheld Drink Mixer - Electric Whisk Foam Maker for Coffee, Lattes, Cappuccino, Matcha, Hot Chocolate & Creamer - Black
short_description: MAKE RICH, CREAMY FROTH IN SECONDS: We coffee lovers are serious when it comes to our coffee. The Milk Boss Frother gives that professional finishing touch to your latte, cappuccino, macchiato or hot chocolate. Make delicious foamy creamer for your drinks at home without a trip to the coffee shop with your own milk frother. The benefits of having your own electric drink whisk mixer are endless, you can make your own best latte, you know your tastes best. Note: Packaging may vary. EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: The durable convenient metal stand gives easy access for foamy goodness in seconds. Cleanup for this matcha wisk & frother is even faster. To clean just put the whisk in hot running water and briefly turn it on – instantly clean! When stored on counter or table it sits nicely next other coffee accessories. Our powerful and durable hand-held milk frother is powered by two AA batteries (included) with a compact electric design that easily fits in a drawer.

name: Electric Milk Frother, 4-in-1 Milk Steamer and Frother, 8.1oz/240ml Automatic Warm and Cold Foam Maker, Auto Shut-Off Frother for Coffee, Latte, Cappuccino, Macchiato(Black)
short_description: Multifunctional 4-in-1: This milk frother and steamer can make hot milk,hot dense foam, hot air foam, or cold foam. Versatile enough for any drink you crave — enjoy café-quality beverages right at home. Masterful Ratio, Taste Perfected: This frother can precisely control the milk-to-foam ratio, producing 50% more foam than ordinary frothers - achieving the ideal proportion for creating richer and smoother beverages. Long-Lasting Perfection: Our milk frother creates silky, long-lasting foam—perfect for lattes, layered cappuccinos, or iced coffees that hold their beauty sip after sip. Unique and Elegant Design: Inspired by ancient Roman column architecture, this milk frother blends timeless elegance with ergonomic design. Its finely sculpted ridges offer both refined aesthetics and a secure, comfortable grip. Optimal Temperature Control: This electric milk frother heats milk to the ideal temperature (149±9°F / 65±5°C), preserving its natural sweetness and silky texture. It automatically shuts off when frothing is complete, making it the perfect tool for home baristas. Easy To Clean: The non-stick interior makes cleanup a breeze. Just rinse it with water and use the included brush to remove any milk residue inside.

name: Paris Rhône Milk Frother, 4-in-1 Milk Steamer and Frother, Hot & Cold Foam Milk Warmer with Temperature Control, Auto Shut-Off Frothers for Coffee, Latte, Cappuccino, Macchiato
short_description: Elegant Eiffel Tower Silhouette: Inspired by the iconic architecture of the Paris Eiffel Tower, this electric milk frother from Paris Rhône is a visual delight that will add a classic appeal to any kitchen worktop. The ergonomic shape ensures that the device is non-slip and easy to grip and operate. 4 Velvety Froth Levels: This milk frother allows you to create and customize your favorite coffeehouse beverage with your preference of froth level: whip the milk into hot dense foam, hot airy foam, or cold froth. It can also heat the milk up to 70°C / 158°F. Perfection at the Push of a Button: Our milk steamer works efficiently to froth milk rapidly and with a low noise level. Select the mode via one push button and make fragrant barista-level milk froth in only 2 minutes. LED indicators clearly indicate the corresponding functions. Simple Maintenance: Featuring a non-stick surface and scratch resistant coating, the Paris Rhône milk froth maker is easy to rinse and wipe clean after daily use. The included cleaning brush helps to remove stubborn residue or build-up. Just a reminder to keep the button and base section dry. ELT Safety Certified: Certified with ETL and equipped with the Strix temperature control, this milk frother will automatically switch off when your milk or froth is ready, preventing your milk from becoming burnt or over-frothed.

name: 4-in-1 Milk Frother, Electric Milk Frother and Steamer with LED Touch Screen, Non-stick Bottom, Milk Warmer 13.52oz for Lattes, Cappuccinos, and Macchiatos at Home, White
short_description: Coffeehouse Style at Home: Our 4-in-1 milk frother gives you thick, light, cold, or warm foam with a touch of a button See the Magic Happen: Transparent glass lets you watch the frothing process for better control Whisper-Quiet and Super Fast: Simply select your preferred mode with a touch of a button, 2-minute frothing Non-stick Coating for Easy Cleaning: This milk frother features a durable non-stick coating that won’t chip or release harmful substances, providing consistent frothing results. Its non-stick coating and wide-mouth design makes cleaning effortless Big Capacity, Small Footprint: Heats up to 400ml (13.52oz) of milk or froths 160ml (5.4 oz) at a time. Compact size fits any kitchen Note: Chill milk to 41-50 ℉ for best results, preferably using whole milk with a fat content of at least 3%

name: Keurig Standalone Frother Works Non-Dairy Milk, Hot and Cold Frothing, 6 Oz, Black
short_description: HOT & ICED LATTES AND CAPPUCCINOS: froth fresh milk in 3 minutes to easily make hot and iced lattes and cappuccinos at home. Lattes: fill to the MAX line 6oz, Cappuccinos: fill to the MIN line 4oz. Note- for iced beverages, only use a plastic cup, do not use glass. FROTH YOUR CHOICE OF FRESH MILK: Froth fresh milk, including skim. Plus soy & almond. Hot and cold frothing available with simple button controls. EASY TO CLEAN: Hand wash. Non-stick coated interior and removable whisk for easy clean up. The removable whisk creates velvety, frothy milk. SLEEK DESIGN: The compact design won't take up counter space and easily stores when not in use. Dimensions: 8" tall by 3.75" wide. SIMPLE BUTTON CONTROLS: The Milk Frother features two frothing options – hot frothing and cold frothing. Press the hot froth button to heat and froth milk for rich lattes and cappuccinos, or press the cold froth button to cold froth milk for creamy and refreshing iced lattes and cappuccinos. ENERGY SAVER: Automatically shuts off when not in use. Voltage: 120 60Hz VAC KEURIG COFFEE MAKER: When creating beverages using your Milk Frother and your Keurig brewer, we recommend brewing a cup of coffee on either a 4oz or 6oz brew size and using the STRONG button if available.
product_description: Introducing the new Keurig Milk Frother. Enjoy creamy, velvety frothed milk with all of your favorite beverages. With the Keurig Milk Frother, you can now easily make hot or iced lattes and cappuccinos at home. The Milk Frother features two frothing options – hot frothing and cold frothing. Press the hot froth button to heat and froth milk for rich lattes and cappuccinos, or press the cold froth button to cold froth milk for creamy and refreshing iced lattes and cappuccinos. Froth your choice of fresh milk including skim – plus soy and almond. The Keurig Milk Frother makes it easy to enjoy the specialty coffeehouse beverages you love, using your Keurig brewer. When creating beverages using your Milk Frother and your Keurig brewer, we recommend brewing a cup of coffee on either a 4oz or 6oz brew size and using the STRONG button if available. To make an iced latte or iced cappuccino, fill a 16oz plastic cup half way with ice and follow the same recommended brewing instructions. Once your coffee is brewed, pour the frothed milk over your coffee and enjoy your delicious hot or iced latte or cappuccino. Note- for iced beverages, only use a plastic cup, do not use glass. The Milk Frother also features a non-stick coating interior for easy clean up and a compact size that won’t take up too much counter space or easily stores away when not in use. The frother is energy efficient and automatically shuts off when not in use.

name: Instant Pot Instant Milk Frother, 4-in-1 Electric Milk Steamer, 10oz/295ml Automatic Hot and Cold Foam Maker and Milk Warmer for Latte, Cappuccinos, Macchiato, From the Makers of Instant 500W, White
short_description: 4 Functions: Cold foam, light warm foam, dense warm foam, or simply warm up your milk, all in one stunning barista-quality appliance. Versatile Frothing & Warming: Perfect for cappuccinos, lattes, cold brews, iced coffees, and more. Ideal for More Than Coffee: Heat milk without foaming for a creamy coffee finish, or whip up non-coffee drinks like hot chocolate, matcha, and more. Effortless Operation: Two simple buttons let you select, start, and stop programs with ease. Designed for Comfort & Control: Cool-touch exterior, ergonomic side handle, and spout for easy, precise pouring. Large-Capacity Pitcher: A sleek, compact design that doesn't skimp on volume—froths up to 8.5 ounces or heats up to 17 ounces for you AND a friend. WhisperQuiet Performance: Keeps operation noise low, so your kitchen stays peaceful even while it’s running.
product_description: The Instant Pot® Milk Frother puts a coffeehouse in your kitchen. Elevate your drinks with 4 fabulous frothing options.

name: Capresso Froth MAX Automatic Milk Frother 208.04
short_description: LARGE CAPACITY: 8-ounce for frothing, 12-ounce for heating without froth PERFECT FROTH: Produces rich frothed milk for cappuccino, café latte and hot chocolate PATENTED TECHNOLOGY: Delivers maximum milk froth at the touch of a button EASY TO CLEAN: Dishwasher safe, removable milk pitcher is BPA free EASY TO OPERATE: Illuminated controls for selecting cold, hot or warm
product_description: Patented TechnologyUnique patented frothing disk delivers maximum milk froth with minimal effortHot, Warm or ColdThree illuminated temperature buttons (cold, hot, warm) can be used with frothing disk or heating disk Dairy FreeCan be used with any type of milk: dairy, soy, almond, oat, hemp, etc. Large Capacity8 ounce for frothed milk and 12 ounce for heated (non-frothed) milkFrothing PitcherBPA-free plastic milk pitcher allows you to view the frothing process and is dishwasher safeSafe OperationDual auto shut-off when temperature is reached or when pitcher is removed from baseTea LattesCan be used to prepare matcha tea, matcha lattes, chai tea lattes, London fog lattes
